snippet: The national prominence of Jair Bolsonaro, a member of Congress, reflects a veering to the right and a growing dissatisfaction with the political establishment.
abstract: Congressman Jair Bolsonaro of Brazil is tapping into public's resentment of political system and Dilma Rousseff's government by excoriating immigrants, homosexuals and fellow politicians; analysts say Bolsonaro is eyeing run at presidency in 2018.

byline.contributor: Paula Moura and Débora Nogueira contributed reporting from São Paulo, Brazil.

lead_paragraph: The national prominence of Jair Bolsonaro, a member of Congress, reflects a veering to the right and a growing dissatisfaction with the political establishment.

headline.main: Conservative’s Star Rises in Brazil as Polarizing Views Tap Into Discontent
headline.print_headline: Conservative’s Star Rises as Polarizing Views Tap Into Brazil’s Discontent
